ComicInfo.Summary: Wildstorm Rising Chapter 5: Since the WildC.A.T.S have allied themselves with the Daemonite, Hightower, Grifter leaves the team and is on his own when he is attacked by a horde of Defile's forces.
ComicInfo.Title: Wildstorm Rising Chapter 5
